name: EVE Online
description: Installs EVE Launcher (1602194, last public build at 21/12/2019)
notes:
You will have to hit esc and change your graphical settings if needed,
You need at least 2GB of storage,
When the official EVE installer finishes unselect "Launch EVE Online".

task.description: Running EVE Online Installer. Please do not run the game until this script finishes installing.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- setup:
    filename: EveLauncher-1602194.exe
    url: https://binaries.eveonline.com/EveLauncher-1602194.exe
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/EVE/eve.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64bit Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Windows 10 mode for Wine
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: win10
- task:
    app: arial
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Running EVE Online Installer. Please do not run the game until this
      script finishes installing.
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
